titleStmt.title: Part of this summers travels, or News from hell, Hull, and Hallifax, from York, Linne, Leicester, Chester, Coventry, Lichfield, Nottingham, and the Divells Ars a peake With many pleasant passages, worthy your observation and reading. By Iohn Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and publication date from STC.
The last two leaves are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
